TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EventLogException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for all the exceptions that are thrown when an error occurs while reading event log related information.

Docs.param: The error code for the error that occurred while reading or configuring event log related information. For more information and a list of event log related error codes, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=82629.
